member.summary: Endpoints related to retrieving market and system data 与检索市场和系统数据相关的端点

member.name: P:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApi.CommonSpotClient
member.summary: Get the ISpotClient for this client. This is a common interface which allows for some basic operations without knowing any details of the exchange. 获取此客户端的 ISpotClient。 这是一个通用接口，允许在不知道任何交换细节的情况下进行一些基本操作。

member.name: T:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount
member.summary: Huobi account endpoints. Account endpoints include balance info, withdraw/deposit info and requesting and account settings 火币账户端点。 账户端点包括余额信息、取款/存款信息以及请求和账户设置

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.GetUserIdAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the user id associated with the apikey/secret 母子用户获取用户UID 此接口用于母子用户查询本用户UID

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.GetSubAccountUsersAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a list of users associated with the apikey/secret 获取子用户列表 母用户通过此接口可获取所有子用户的UID列表及各用户状态

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.GetSubUserAccountsAsync(System.Int64,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a list of sub-user accounts associated with the sub-user id 获取特定子用户的账户列表 母用户通过此接口可获取特定子用户的Account ID列表及各账户状态
member.param: The if of the user to get accounts for

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.GetAccountsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a list of accounts associated with the apikey/secret 账户信息 查询当前用户的所有账户 ID account-id 及其相关信息

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.GetBalancesAsync(System.Int64,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a list of balances for a specific account 账户余额 查询指定账户的余额，支持以下账户： spot：现货账户， margin：逐仓杠杆账户，otc：OTC 账户，point：点卡账户，super-margin：全仓杠杆账户, investment: C2C杠杆借出账户, borrow: C2C杠杆借入账户，grid-trading：策略帐户，deposit-earning：理财帐户，otc-options：期权帐户
member.param: The id of the account to get the balances for

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.GetAssetValuationAsync(Huobi.Net.Enums.AccountType,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the valuation of all assets 获取平台资产总估值 按照BTC或法币计价单位，获取平台账户的总资产估值。
member.param: The currency to get the value in
The id of the sub user

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.TransferAssetAsync(System.Int64,Huobi.Net.Enums.AccountType,System.Int64,System.Int64,Huobi.Net.Enums.AccountType,System.Int64,System.String,System.Decimal,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary:
Transfer assets between accounts
资产划转 该节点为母用户和子用户进行资产划转的通用接口。

Gets a list of balance changes of specified user's account
账户流水 该节点基于用户账户ID返回账户流水。
member.param: The id of the account to get the balances for
Far point of time of the query window. The maximum size of the query window is 1 hour. The query window can be shifted within 30 days
Near point of time of the query window. The maximum size of the query window is 1 hour. The query window can be shifted within 30 days
Maximum number of items in each response (from 1 to 500, default is 100)

member.summary: This endpoint returns the balance changes of specified user's account. 财务流水 该节点基于用户账户ID返回财务流水。
member.param: The id of the account to get the ledger for
Far point of time of the query window. The maximum size of the query window is 10 days. The query window can be shifted within 30 days
Near point of time of the query window. The maximum size of the query window is 10 days. The query window can be shifted within 30 days
Maximum number of items in each response (from 1 to 500, default is 100)
Only get orders with ID before or after this. Used together with the direction parameter

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.GetSubAccountBalancesAsync(System.Int64,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a list of balances for a specific sub account 子用户余额 母用户查询子用户各币种账户余额
member.param: The id of the sub account to get the balances for

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.TransferWithSubAccountAsync(System.Int64,System.String,System.Decimal,Huobi.Net.Enums.TransferType,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Transfer asset between parent and sub account 资产划转（母子用户之间） 母用户执行母子用户之间的划转
member.param: The target sub account id to transfer to or from
The quantity of asset to transfer
member.returns: Unique transfer id

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.GetDepositAddressesAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Parent user and sub user could query deposit address of corresponding chain, for a specific crypto currency (except IOTA). 充币地址查询 此节点用于查询特定币种（IOTA除外）在其所在区块链中的充币地址，母子用户均可用

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.WithdrawAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Decimal,System.Decimal,System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Parent user creates a withdraw request from spot account to an external address (exists in your withdraw address list), which doesn't require two-factor-authentication. 虚拟币提币 此节点用于将现货账户的数字币提取到区块链地址（已存在于提币地址列表）而不需要多重（短信、邮件）验证，限母用户可用
member.param: The desination address of this withdraw
The quantity of asset to withdraw
The fee to pay with this withdraw
Set as "usdt" to withdraw USDT to OMNI, set as "trc20usdt" to withdraw USDT to TRX
A tag specified for this address

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.GetWithdrawDepositAsync(Huobi.Net.Enums.WithdrawDepositType,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{Huobi.Net.Enums.FilterDirection},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Parent user and sub user searche for all existed withdraws and deposits and return their latest status. 充提记录 此节点用于查询充提记录，母子用户均可用
member.param: The transfer id to begin search
The number of items to return

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.RepayMarginLoanAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Decimal,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Repay a margin loan 归还借币（全仓逐仓通用） 还币顺序为，（如不指定transactId）先借先还，利息先还；如指定transactId时，currency参数不做校验。

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.TransferSpotToIsolatedMarginAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Decimal,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Transfer asset from spot account to isolated margin account 资产划转（逐仓）此接口用于现货账户与逐仓杠杆账户的资产互转。 从现货账户划转至逐仓杠杆账户 transfer-in，从逐仓杠杆账户划转至现货账户 transfer-out
member.returns: Transfer id

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.TransferIsolatedMarginToSpotAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Decimal,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Transfer asset from isolated margin to spot account 资产划转（逐仓）此接口用于现货账户与逐仓杠杆账户的资产互转。 从现货账户划转至逐仓杠杆账户 transfer-in，从逐仓杠杆账户划转至现货账户 transfer-out
member.returns: Transfer id

member.summary: Get isolated loan interest rate and quotas 查询借币币息率及额度（逐仓） 此接口返回用户级别的借币币息率及借币额度。

member.summary: Request a loan on isolated margin 申请借币（逐仓） 此接口用于申请借币
member.returns: Order id

member.summary: Repay a isolated margin loan 归还借币（逐仓） 此接口用于归还借币.
member.returns: Order id

member.summary: Get isolated margin orders history 查询借币订单（逐仓） 此接口基于指定搜索条件返回借币订单。

Start order id for use in combination with direction
Direction of results in combination with from parameter

member.summary: Get isolated margin account balance 借币账户详情（逐仓） 此接口返回借币账户详情。

Direction of results in combination with from parameter

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.SubUserCreationAsync(Huobi.Net.Objects.Models.HuobiCreateSubUserAccountRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sub user creation 子用户创建
member.param: Huobi create sub user account request
member.returns: Huobi sub user account list

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.LockOrUnlockSubUserAsync(System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Lock/Unlock Sub User 冻结/解冻子用户

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.SubUserAPIKeyCreationAsync(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sub user API key creation 子用户API key创建
member.param: Google verification code of the parent user, the parent user must be bound to Google Authenticator for verification on the web

API key permissions:Valid value: readOnly, trade; multiple inputs are allowed, separated by comma, i.e. readOnly, trade; readOnly is required permission for any API key, while trade permission is optional.

The IPv4/IPv6 host address or IPv4 network address bound to the API key: At most 20 IPv4/IPv6 host address(es) and/or IPv4 network address(es) can bind with one API key, separated by comma. For example: 202.106.196.115, 202.106.96.0/24. An API key not linked with an IP address but has trading or withdrawal permissions will be automatically deactivated after 90 days of inactivity.

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.SubUserAPIKeyModificationAsync(System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sub user API key modification 修改子用户API key
member.param: Access key for sub user API key

API key permissions:Valid value: readOnly, trade; multiple inputs are allowed, separated by comma, i.e. readOnly, trade; readOnly is required permission for any API key, while trade permission is optional.

The IPv4/IPv6 host address or IPv4 network address bound to the API key: At most 20 IPv4/IPv6 host address(es) and/or IPv4 network address(es) can bind with one API key, separated by comma. For example: 202.106.196.115, 202.106.96.0/24. An API key not linked with an IP address but has trading or withdrawal permissions will be automatically deactivated after 90 days of inactivity.

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.SubUserAPIKeyDeletionAsync(System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sub user API key deletion 删除子用户API key

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiAccount.APIKeyQueryAsync(System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: API key query 母子用户API key信息查询
member.param: parent user uid , sub user uid
The access key of the API key, if not specified, it will return all API keys belong to the UID.

member.name: T:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiExchangeData
member.summary: Huobi exchange data endpoints. Exchange data includes market data (tickers, order books, etc) and system status. 火币交换数据端点。 交易所数据包括市场数据（代码、订单簿等）和系统状态。

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiExchangeData.GetTickersAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the latest ticker for all symbols 所有交易对的最新 Tickers

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiExchangeData.GetTickerAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the ticker, including the best bid / best ask for a symbol 聚合行情（Ticker） 此接口获取ticker信息同时提供最近24小时的交易聚合信息。
member.param: The symbol to get the ticker for

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiExchangeData.GetKlinesAsync(System.String,Huobi.Net.Enums.KlineInterval,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get candlestick data for a symbol K 线数据（蜡烛图） 此接口返回历史K线数据。K线周期以新加坡时间为基准开始计算，例如日K线的起始周期为新加坡时间0时至新加坡时间次日0时。
member.param: The symbol to get the data for
The period of a single candlestick

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiExchangeData.GetOrderBookAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the order book for a symbol 市场深度数据 此接口返回指定交易对的当前市场深度数据。
member.param: The way the results will be merged together

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiExchangeData.GetLastTradeAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the last trade for a symbol 最近市场成交记录 此接口返回指定交易对最新的一个交易记录。

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiExchangeData.GetTradeHistoryAsync(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the last x trades for a symbol 获得近期交易记录 此接口返回指定交易对近期的所有交易记录。
member.param: The symbol to get trades for

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiExchangeData.GetSymbolDetails24HAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets 24h stats for a symbol 最近24小时行情数据 此接口返回最近24小时的行情数据汇总。 此接口返回的成交量、成交金额为24小时滚动数据（平移窗口大小24小时），有可能会出现后一个窗口内的累计成交量、累计成交额小于前一窗口的情况。
member.param: The symbol to get the data for

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiExchangeData.GetNavAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets real time NAV for ETP 获取杠杆ETP实时净值 此接口返回杠杆ETP的最新净值。
member.param: The symbol to get the data for

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiExchangeData.GetSymbolStatusAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the current market status 获取当前市场状态 此节点返回当前最新市场状态。 状态枚举值包括: 1 - 正常（可下单可撤单），2 - 挂起（不可下单不可撤单），3 - 仅撤单（不可下单可撤单）。 挂起原因枚举值包括: 2 - 紧急维护，3 - 计划维护。

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiExchangeData.GetSymbolsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a list of supported symbols 获取所有交易对(V1)(deprecated) 此接口返回所有火币全球站支持的交易对。

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiExchangeData.GetServerTimeAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the server time 获取当前系统时间戳 此接口返回当前的系统时间戳，即从 UTC 1970年1月1日0时0分0秒0毫秒到现在的总毫秒数。

member.name: T:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiTrading
member.summary: Huobi trading endpoints, placing and mananging orders. 火币交易端点，下单和管理订单。
Places an order 下单 发送一个新订单到火币以进行撮合。
member.param: The account to place the order for
The symbol to place the order for
The price of the order. Should be omitted for market orders
The clientOrderId the order should get

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiTrading.GetOpenOrdersAsync(System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.String,System.Nullable{Huobi.Net.Enums.OrderSide},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a list of open orders 查询当前未成交订单 查询已提交但是仍未完全成交或未被撤销的订单。
member.param: The account id for which to get the orders for
The symbol for which to get the orders for
Only get buy or sell orders

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiTrading.CancelOrderAsync(System.Int64,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Cancels an open order 撤销订单 此接口发送一个撤销订单的请求。
member.param: The id of the order to cancel

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiTrading.CancelOrderByClientOrderIdAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Cancels an open order 撤销订单（基于client order ID） 此接口基于client-order-id（8小时内有效）发送一个撤销订单的请求。
member.param: The client id of the order to cancel

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiTrading.CancelOrdersAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Int64},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Cancel multiple open orders 批量撤销指定订单 此接口同时为多个订单（基于id）发送取消请求，建议通过order-ids来撤单，比client-order-ids更快更稳定。
member.param: The ids of the orders to cancel
The client ids of the orders to cancel

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiTrading.CancelOrdersByCriteriaAsync(System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Nullable{Huobi.Net.Enums.OrderSide},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Cancel multiple open orders 批量撤销所有订单 此接口发送批量撤销所有（单次最大100个）订单的请求。
member.param: The account id used for this cancel
The trading symbol list (maximum 10 symbols, default value all symbols)
Filter on the direction of the trade
The number of orders to cancel [1, 100]

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiTrading.GetOrderAsync(System.Int64,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get details of an order 查询订单详情 此接口返回指定订单的最新状态和详情。通过API创建的订单，撤销超过2小时后无法查询。通过API创建的订单返回order-id，按此order-id查询订单还是返回base-record-invalid是因为系统内部处理有延迟，但是不影响成交。建议您后续重试查询或者通过订阅订单推送WebSocket消息查询。
member.param: The id of the order to retrieve

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiTrading.GetOrderByClientOrderIdAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get details of an order by client order id 查询订单详情（基于client order ID） 此接口返回指定用户自编订单号（8小时内）的订单最新状态和详情。通过API创建的订单，撤销超过2小时后无法查询。建议通过GET /v1/order/orders/{order-id}来撤单，比使用clientOrderId更快更稳定
member.param: The client id of the order to retrieve

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiTrading.GetOrderTradesAsync(System.Int64,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a list of trades made for a specific order 成交明细 此接口返回指定订单的成交明细。
member.param: The id of the order to get trades for

member.summary: Gets a list of orders 搜索历史订单 此接口基于搜索条件查询历史订单。通过API创建的订单，撤销超过2小时后无法查询。
member.param: The symbol to get orders for
The states of orders to return
The types of orders to return
Only get orders after this date
Only get orders before this date
Only get orders with ID before or after this. Used together with the direction parameter
Direction of the results to return when using the fromId parameter

member.summary: Gets a list of trades for a specific symbol 当前和历史成交 此接口基于搜索条件查询当前和历史成交记录。
member.param: Only return trades with specific states
The symbol to retrieve trades for
The type of orders to return
Only get orders after this date
Only get orders before this date
Only get orders with ID before or after this. Used together with the direction parameter
Direction of the results to return when using the fromId parameter

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiTrading.GetHistoricalOrdersAsync(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{Huobi.Net.Enums.FilterDirection},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a list of history orders 搜索最近48小时内历史订单 此接口基于搜索条件查询最近48小时内历史订单。通过API创建的订单，撤销超过2小时后无法查询。
member.param: The symbol to get orders for
Only get orders after this date
Only get orders before this date
Direction of the results to return

member.summary: Place a new conditional order 策略委托下单 仅可通过此节点下单策略委托，不可通过现货/杠杆交易相关接口下单策略委托，支持未触发OPEN订单最大数量为100。
member.param: The account the order should be placed from
The symbol the order is for

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiTrading.CancelConditionalOrdersAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Cancel conditional orders 策略委托（触发前）撤单 限频值（NEW）：20次/2秒 单次请求最多批量撤销50张订单
member.param: Client order ids of the conditional orders to cancels

member.summary: Get open conditional orders based on the parameters 查询未触发OPEN策略委托 以orderOrigTime检索 未触发OPEN订单，指的是已成功下单，但尚未触发，订单状态orderStatus为created的订单 未触发OPEN订单，可通过此节点查询，但不可通过现货/杠杆交易相关接口查询
Get closed conditional orders 查询策略委托历史 历史终态订单包括，触发前被主动撤销的策略委托（orderStatus=canceled），触发失败的策略委托（orderStatus=rejected），触发成功的策略委托（orderStatus=triggered）。
member.param: Return only entries after this time
Return only entries before this time

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiClientSpotApiTrading.GetConditionalOrderAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get a conditional order by id 查询特定策略委托 如需查询已成功触发订单的后续状态，须通过现货/杠杆交易相关接口完成 未触发的策略委托及触发失败的策略委托，可通过此节点查询，但不可通过现货/杠杆交易相关接口查询

Cancellation token for closing this subscription

Cancellation token for closing this subscription

Cancellation token for closing this subscription

member.summary: Subscribe to changes of a symbol's best ask/bid 主题订阅 买一卖一逐笔行情 当买一价、买一量、卖一价、卖一量，其中任一数据发生变化时，此主题推送逐笔更新。
member.param: Cancellation token for closing this subscription
member.returns: A stream subscription. This stream subscription can be used to be notified when the socket is disconnected/reconnected

member.summary: Subscribe to updates of orders 订阅订单更新 订单的更新推送由任一以下事件触发：
member.param: Event handler for the order submitted event 订单创建
Event handler for the order matched event 订单成交
Event handler for the order cancelled event 订单撤销
Event handler for the conditional order trigger failed event 计划委托或追踪委托触发失败事件
Event handler for the condition order canceled event 计划委托或追踪委托触发前撤单事件
Cancellation token for closing this subscription
member.returns: A stream subscription. This stream subscription can be used to be notified when the socket is disconnected/reconnected

member.name: M:Huobi.Net.Interfaces.Clients.SpotApi.IHuobiSocketClientSpotStreams.SubscribeToAccountUpdatesAsync(System.Action{CryptoExchange.Net.Sockets.DataEvent{Huobi.Net.Objects.Models.Socket.HuobiAccountUpdate}},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Subscribe to updates of account balances 订阅账户变更
member.param: Event handler 订阅账户的余额更新
The update mode. Defaults to 1, see API docs for more info 用户可选择以下任一账户变更推送的触发方式 1、仅在账户余额发生变动时推送； 2、在账户余额发生变动或可用余额发生变动时均推送，且分别推送。 3、在账户余额发生变动或可用余额发生变动时均推送，且一起推送。
Cancellation token for closing this subscription
member.returns: A stream subscription. This stream subscription can be used to be notified when the socket is disconnected/reconnected

member.summary: Subscribe to detailed order matched/canceled updates 订阅清算后成交及撤单更新 仅当用户订单成交或撤销时推送。其中，订单成交为逐笔推送，如一张 taker 订单同时与多张 maker 订单成交，该接口将推送逐笔更新。但用户收到的这几笔成交消息的次序，有可能与实际的成交次序不完全一致。另外，如果一张订单的成交及撤销几乎同时发生，例如 IOC 订单成交后剩余部分被自动撤销，用户可能会先收到撤单推送，再收到成交推送。
member.param: Event handler for the order matched event
Event handler for the order canceled event
Cancellation token for closing this subscription
member.returns: A stream subscription. This stream subscription can be used to be notified when the socket is disconnected/reconnected

member.summary: After how much time we should consider the connection dropped if no data is received for this time after the initial subscriptions

member.summary: The client to use for the socket connection. When using the same client for multiple order books the connection can be shared.
